articles.title: Trump to announce Golden Fleet program, building new battleship class, WSJ says
articles.mainIdea: Trump to announce Golden Fleet program, building new battleship class, WSJ says
articles.summary: TipRanks: Trump to announce Golden Fleet program, building new battleship class, WSJ says. President Trump will announce that the U.S. Navy intends to build a new “Trump-class” battleship as part of the “Golden Fleet” initiative, The Wall Street Journal’s Lara Seligman and Marcus Weisgerber report, citing a U.S. official. The new battleship will be an upgrade relative to the Navy’s Arleigh Burke-class destroyers, which Trump has compared unfavorably to rival navies, the report states. Shares of Huntington Ingalls (HII) are up 4% afterhours following the WSJ report.Claim 70% Off TipRan

articles.title: NBA Champion Jalen Williams Joins Forces With Paycom
articles.mainIdea: NBA Champion Jalen Williams Joins Forces With Paycom
articles.summary: Business Wire: NBA Champion Jalen Williams Joins Forces With Paycom. OKLAHOMA CITY, December 23, 2025--Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) ("Paycom"), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, announced a new multiyear partnership with NBA champion and All-Star Jalen (JDub) Williams. The partnership will kick off with Williams starring in Paycom’s latest campaign promoting its groundbreaking command-driven AI engine, IWant. Related tickers mentioned: PAYC.

articles.title: Nielsen, Roku deepen data-sharing pact to enhance streaming measurement
articles.mainIdea: Nielsen, Roku deepen data-sharing pact to enhance streaming measurement
articles.summary: Marketing Dive: Nielsen, Roku deepen data-sharing pact to enhance streaming measurement. As part of the agreement, Nielsen will continue to receive support for offerings like Big Data + Panel while Roku gains access to streaming TV ratings.
